channel.title: How do I make ::mage and ::range commands?
channel.description:
I'm asking for my servers Owner, he needs help with it, and also advice for some good ones. That's where you all come in =) lol
And some Mod and Admin commands.

item.title: How do I make ::mage and ::range commands?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Just search any other commands…

ex> ctrl + f (search) - else if(command.startsWith("food") or what ever other command exists in your server. Then put the command above the other one, like…

/ Right here above else if(command.star… etc etc [sup][Note 1][/sup]

else if(command.startsWith("existing command")){ sendMessage("real"); }

^ right here below the } but remember, keep the command above the next one (note 1)

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make ::mage and ::range commands?

item.title: How do I make ::mage and ::range commands?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

else if(command.startsWith("magestuff") && playerRights = >0){ addItem(item ID, 1); sendMessage("Go mage yourself"); }
item ID would be the item it adds. If it’s more than one just make the addItem line more times…
and the = >0 to what ever level player can do it

IE 0 = normal player; 1 = mod; 2 = admin; 3 = owner

Or you could just take that line out completely and have else if(command.startsWith("magestuff")){

Read full topic
